alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:11AM PST until January 29 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of three to six inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph cause reductions to visibility and hazardous driving conditions. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
